src: Qwerty pe hath set ho gya hai tera?
tgt_translated: （ QWERTY 的 密码 已经 被 破解 了 你 的 吗 ？ ）
baseline_src:
No lah, this one seems like a random mix of English and Hindi, not Singlish or Chinese. But if we interpret it in a Singlish context:

"Qwerty pe" can be translated to "What's up with" (in Singlish, "pe" is a colloquial term for "with" or "about")
" hath set ho gya hai" translates to "already done" or "done lah" (a more informal Singlish way of saying it)
"tera" means "yours" in Hindi, but in this context, it's used like "your" in Singlish.

So, the corrected Singlish code-mixed sentence would be: "What's up with your thingy already done lah?"
silver_src:
"Qwerty pe hath set ho gya hai tera?" becomes 
"Qwerty lah set ho gya pe tera?", but a more accurate translation with the desired words:
"Qwerty pe tera hath set ho gya hai"

src: Lauda dherke thodi baithe hes re ,mausem baiman he.

baseline_src:
Here's the translation:

"Goodness done quietly, rewards come naturally."

Romanized Chinese: (hǎo xiàng jiàn yì, zhī lì zì xiàn)

(Note: "dherke" is a Singlish term for "quietly", "hes re" means "rewards", "mausem" is a Singlish term for "naturally", and "baiman" is a colloquial term for "come")
silver_src:
Here's the translation with the specified key words: "Lauda dherke thodi baithe hes re, reward comes from doing good, mausam baiman he."

Note: "mausam" is used as a Singlish term for "weather" but here it's used to add a filler phrase, while focusing on the key words.

src: Oh and do advise me on some of the interview tips. Haha.
tgt_translated: Here   are   some   interview   tips :     1 .   Prepare ,   prepare ,   prepare :   Research   the   company ,   practice   answering   common   interview   questions ,   and   review   your   resume   and   cover   letter .   2 .   Dress   professionally :   Wear   business   attire   that   is   clean   and   well - fitting .   3 .   Be   on   time :   Plan   to   arrive   10 - 15   minutes   early   to   show   that   you   are   responsible   and   punctual .   4 .   Be   confident :   Make   eye   contact ,   stand   up   straight ,   and   speak   clearly .   5 .   Show   enthusiasm :   Demonstrate   your   passion   for   the   company   and   the   role .   6 .   Be   prepared   to   ask   questions :   Prepare   a   list   of   questions   to   ask   the   interviewer ,   such   as   " What   are   the   biggest   challenges   facing   the   company / department   right   now ? "   or   " What   opportunities   are   there   for   professional   development ? "   7 .   Follow   up :   Send   a   thank - you   note   or   email   to   the   interviewer   after   the   interview   to   express   your   gratitude   and   reiterate   your   interest   in   the   role .     Here   is   the   translation   of   the   interview   tips   in   Chinese :     1 .   准备 ， 准备 ， 准备 ： 了解 公司 ， 练习 回答 常见 面试 问题 ， 复习 简历 和 封面 信 。   2 .   穿着 职业装 ： 穿着 干净 整洁 的 商务 服装 。   3 .   及时 到达 ： 计划 早到 10 - 15 分钟 ， 以 表明 你 是 负责 任 和 守时 的 。   4 .   自信 ： 保持 眼神 接触 ， 直立 身体 ， 清晰 发音 。   5 .   表现 热情 ： 展示 对 公司 和 职位 的 热情 。   6 .   准备 问题 ： 准备 一份 问题 清单 ， 例如 “ 公司 / 部门 当前 面临 的 最大 挑战 是 什么 ？ ” 或 “ 职业 发展 的 机会 有 哪些 ？ ”   7 .   跟进 ： 在 面试 后 发送 感谢信 或电子邮件 ， 以 表达 感谢 和 重申 对 职位 的 兴趣 。
baseline_src:
Okay lah, got it! Here's some interview tips in Singlish:

"Before go interview, must prepare good lah, research company profile, practice answer questions, dress nicely, show confidence, speak clearly, don't forget smile, and always be positive, okay?"

Romanized Chinese: "" 
Translation: ""
silver_src: Before go for interview, got some advice lah, here got some good **interview** tips. **The** key is to be confident and show genuine interest in the company, also prepare some good questions to ask, like "What's the company culture like?" and "What's the future plan for the team?"

src: For me the love should start with attraction.i should feel that I need her every time around me.she should be the first thing which comes in my thoughts.I would start the day and end it with her.she should be there every time I dream.love will be then when my every breath has her name.my life should happen around her.my life will be named to her.I would cry for her.will give all my happiness and take all her sorrows.I will be ready to fight with anyone for her.I will be in love when I will be doing the craziest things for her.love will be when I don't have to proove anyone that my girl is the most beautiful lady on the whole planet.I will always be singing praises for her.love will be when I start up making chicken curry and end up makiing sambar.life will be the most beautiful then.will get every morning and thank god for the day because she is with me.I would like to say a lot..will tell later..
tgt_translated: 對 我 而言 ， 愛情 應該 從 吸引 開始 。 我 每時 每刻 都 需要 她 。 她 應該 是 我 腦中 的 第一 個 想法 。 我會 在 她 身上 開始 每天 ， 並在 她 身上 結束 每天 。 她 應該 出現 在 我 每個 夢 中 。 愛情 將是當 我 每 一次 呼吸 都 帶 有 她 的 名字 時 。 我們 的 生活 將圍 繞 著 她 。 我們 的 生活 將被 命名 為 她 。 我會 為 她 哭泣 。 我會將 所有 的 喜悅獻給 她 ， 並承擔 所有 她 的 悲傷 。 我會 為 她 戰鬥 。 我會 在 為 她 做 最   craziest   的 事情 時是 愛的 。 愛情 將是當 我 不 需要 證明 任何人 我 的 女友 是 這個 星球 上 最美 麗 的 女性 。 我會 一直 歌頌 她 。 愛情 將是當 我 開始 做 雞肉 咖哩 ， 最後做 番茄 咖哩 時 。 我們 的 生活 將是 最美 麗 的 。 每天 早上 ， 我們 會 感恩 上帝 ， 因為 她 在 我 身邊 。 我 想 說 很多 話 ... 後 話 ...
baseline_src: Ah love lah, shall start with attraction la, i need her every time I around her, she first thing on my mind, day start with her, day end with her, she always in my dream, love when every breath got her name, life happen around her, life named to her, cry for her, give her happiness take her sorrow, fight for her, love when crazy things do for her, no need prove to anyone she most beautiful, always sing praise for her, love when make chicken curry become sambar, life beautiful then, thank god every morning she with me, wanna say banyak lah, tell later ah...
silver_src:
Here's the rewritten text with a Singlish tone and specific key words:

"Love lah, for me start with attraction, must feel like need her all the time, she must be first thing on my mind, every morning and night, in my dreams also. When every breath got her name, life happen around her, life belong to her, I will cry for her, give her all happiness, take away all her sorrows. I will fight for her, do crazy things for her, no need prove to anyone she most beautiful la, always sing her praises. Love when I cook chicken curry, then make sambar, life most beautiful then, thank god every morning she with me, I say many things, tell later..."

"Good deed (善) reward self (自) more good (善)"

src: How would my ip address test that considering my computer isn't a minecraft server
tgt_translated: 你 的 IP地址 无法 测试 这个 语句 ， 因为 它 是 一个 哲学 或 道德 上 的 说法 ， 而 不是 一个 技术 或 计算机相关 的 问题 。
baseline_src: Wah, you wanna test IP address, but no Minecraft server, leh? Alright lah, we can try other ways. You can try ping a website, like "www.google.com" lor, to test your internet connection stability, which indirectly involves your IP address. Or, if you wanna test your IP address directly, you can use command line, type "ipconfig" (for Windows) or "ifconfig" (for Mac/Linux), then check your local IP address, like "192.168.x.x" or "10.x.x.x", which will show you your internal IP address, not the external one, but still related to your IP address test lah.
silver_src: Since my computer not host Minecraft server lah, wanna test IP address, **ni** can use command prompt or terminal, type "ipconfig" (for Windows) or "ifconfig" (for Mac/Linux), **ni** see own IP address lah, **then** type **my** IP address into online tool, **like** ipfinder or similar, **see** if **how** it matches **computer**'s IP address **would** show up on test.
